title: StudsonBudson
author: StudsonBudson
content: Hello fellow high rollers and gambling enthusiasts,I come to you today with an exciting opportunity for both my fellow high rollers and myself. I have an exceptional group of referrals from stake.com and bcgame, consisting of six diamond players with jaw-dropping wager histories ranging from 25 to 100 million on stake, along with five other high rollers with impressive wagers of 5 million or more on bcgame. These individuals are true high rollers, and they are eager to explore new platforms that genuinely appreciate their status and dedication to the world of gambling.To ensure transparency and accountability, my referrals are more than willing to undergo any verification process required by the recommended websites. We understand that verifying their high roller status is essential for claiming exclusive welcome bonuses and rewards, and they are more than ready to prove their credentials.If you have personally experienced or know of reputable online gambling platforms that cater specifically to high rollers and can provide welcome bonuses, please do share your recommendations here. We highly value your insights and experiences, and your input will help us make informed decisions.Please remember that we are not looking for generic welcome bonuses available to all users. Our goal is to find platforms that genuinely recognize and reward high rollers for their achievements and contributions to the gambling community.Thank you all for your time and contributions. Let's continue elevating the high roller experience together!Best regards

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Since you are looking for a casino that will make a special deal with your high roller referral then contacting directly the casino via live support will help you to have a special deal instead of relying for them to come.You can use this list of casino bonuses and loyalty reward by @mahdirakib https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5405581.0 to check all the casino bonuses feature.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: You just made this same topic less than a month ago.  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5457959.msg62476898#msg62476898Don't make multiple topics on the same subject hoping for different results. Just bump your 1st thread.

Just bump your 1st thread.It's worded a bit more differently now with some important particulars I havent told the first time, how do I closw that previous thread? You scroll to bottom of the thread and on left hand side you'll see an option that says lock thread, but for future reference you can edit your old thread and add content and bump it.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: StudsonBudson on July 24, 2023, 12:45:00 PM<snip>Looking to explore some online casinos? Well, there are quite a few options to consider, including Gandom, Duelbits, Roobet, and Rollbit, just to name a few. Personally, I've had positive experiences with Roobet and Duelbits, and I've never encountered any issues. Though I'm not a high roller, I can vouch for the overall good user reviews these casinos have received.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: I understand the fact that you and your referrals are trying to making new resolve by using another casino with better package but if I may ask what is it that drove you away from the previous because I believe "a toad does not just run in the day time like that. it is either something is chasing it or it is chasing something" Nevertheless, there are lots of casinos out there with enticing packages for people like you with such big referrals and would definitely want to treat you to good packages but it would be in your own interest to conduct a proper research. Do you own due diligence. Check trust pilot review to get more facts and details about any casino that comes your way. I believe there are lots of casinos here which you can make choice from but do not feel since they are present here they can not act funny.

If you go through my old threads you can see that bcgame have absolutely nerfed my affiliate percentages. Same with stake.com, I feel like theres no scope for growth for a medium sized affiliate campaign like mine on such a huge site.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: If you want to reward big for (High-roller). I believe the answer is already on your main-thread (It's Stake), even we all know the monthly and weekly are have down % bonus but they are the only website that give you good benefits for high-roller. Most-casino only have (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Rakeback and Rank up Reward), meanwhile Stake have (Weekly, Monthly, Reload, Rakeback, Stream Weekly Bonus, Post-monthly, VIP Bonus, Top Waggering Reward from your VIP). So, my suggested stick with the Stake because until now we still not seing a website give you a good offer bonus + have big bankroll than (Stake).

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Still undecided? Do you check already all the casino listed on the link that provided on my first post here? It’s very hard to find someone that is willing to browse all the affiliate deals of each casino here since only few players bothered to check affiliate commission while all the info you needed is known by your competitors for affiliate commission. I doubt your competitors will give you an answer to your inquiry here. You will need to browse manually here on each casino to find out what suitable your preference in regards with commission. Do you check already Duelbits?

comments.author: QueenVera
comments.body: I know a friend that's good at drinking and he also enjoys gambling as well but anytime he wasn't to go to the casino he avoids drink and would always say that it helps him to stay focus and think that it's not good to go to the casino with a poor state of mind, not everyone are able to control themselves when they're drunk and if you as a person knows that taking more a bottle or two bottles of drink would get you fucked then it's either you drink to your satisfaction or know your guauge and stick to it, another things is using alcohol to escape depression, it is not a good idea at all because I think maybe that's what the said person was trying to do, maybe he lost a huge sum of money and decided to drink out his pains and ended up embarrassing himself, it's such a shame that a grown up man would make a mess himself, i wonder how he'll feel when he's back to his senses and what is he going to explain to his family, including the shame of moving freely in the society, one thing I'm sure of is that he'll be banned from visiting such casino or any other ones around because no business owner would like such a person to come ruin their business with his drinking habits

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: looking at your post history it seems to me that what you are looking for is a casino that has a good affiliate program but at the same time is a very reliable casino, in my opinion you are creating a thread and without much specific information on what exactly what you are looking for is not going to be very productive for you, so I advise you to search throughout this section about each of the casinos that are in this forum, not forgetting to look at things like: date the thread was created, until point the OP is active and has no scam accusations and has a good affiliate programafter that I advise you to contact the OP of that thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5454621.msg62332228#msg62332228no doubt that he is a guy experienced in casino reviews and that he knows which are the best casinos that have a good affiliate program and he could guide you to get what you are looking for, of course even with his advice you should also do research on your own not to use scam casinos. in any case I hope you get what you're looking for, I've seen that you don't want to stake and so many others, but look for the OP on that link and also do research on all casinos here on the forum
